universal.value: The user data have been saved successfully using defined settings.
The selected user data have been reset successfully and the user has been notified.
Send an informational e-Mail containing the access information.
This address is only used to send the registration information. If it stays empty, the system will use the registration e-Mail address definied earlier.
You may complete the registration right now or send an e-Mail containing an invitation and vID to test the e-Mail address.
The administration has reset the following profile data for your account. Please use these data for your next access.
The administration has created a user account for you. Needed access data have been attached to this message.
Available functions for the user and group control panel
Access data for your new account
The administration invites you cordially to register an account. Please click on the link below to complete the registration process using the given access information.
